scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cp -R build .. && cd .. && rm -rf public && mv build public
scripts.deploy: git add -A && git commit -m "Deploy to azure" && git push --force https://gh428:GH428429@grhfree.scm.azurewebsites.net:443/grhfree.git HEAD:master
scripts.ins: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
